function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible SARS-CoV-2 infection in high-risk sites","Impact":"Exposure to respiratory secretions harboring SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technology, air filtration systems","People":"Medical staff, patients, general public","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Unsterilized medical wastewater spilling aerial viruses","Impact":"Depositing SARS-CoV-2 on neighboring surfaces and soils","Mitigation":"Implement proper sterilization and containment of medical wastewater","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment systems, disinfection technology","People":"Wastewater treatment sector workers, community members","Owner":"Environmental regulators, wastewater treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Lack of research on soil infections and virus persistence","Impact":"Potential contribution to SARS-CoV-2 spread in exterior environs","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive studies on virus persistence in soils","Technologies":"Soil testing technology, environmental monitoring systems","People":"Environmental researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental agencies"}]}
